InstalledItem.Name: Ice-Flush
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Cooler
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 3
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

The Juno Starwerk Ice-Flush cooler is built to withstand the heat demands and thermal strains that many industrial ships deal with as part of their average workday.

InstalledItem.Name: Reliance
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Power Plant
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk
Size: 3
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

Haulers have been a fan of the Reliance power plant for years. The component’s clean design and Juno Starwerk’s lauded customer support have made this power plant a fixture on ships around the Empire.

InstalledItem.Name: Kama
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Quantum Drive
Manufacturer: Juno Starwerk 
Size: 3
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Kama from Juno Starwerk has won more “Fan Favorite” reader’s poll from ‘Long Haul Quarterly’ than any other industrial quantum drive in its class.

InstalledItem.Name: Barbican
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Shield Generator
Manufacturer: Basilisk
Size: 3
Grade: B
Class: Industrial

Barricade your ship against external forces with the Basilisk Barbican. Originally fabricated for large industrial vessels, this shield generator has became quite popular due to its high damage absorption.

InstalledItem.Name: Surveyor
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: Chimera Communications
Size: 2
Grade: C
Class: Industrial

The Surveyor radar from Chimera Communications does away with all the unnecessary extras other manufacturers hide behind to focus on what matters: signature and emission detection that works the way you need it to.

InstalledItem.Name: Ecouter
InstalledItem.Description:
Item Type: Radar
Manufacturer: GNP
Size: 1
Grade: C
Class: Military

Space is vast and unknowable, that’s why discerning pilots rely on the Ecouter small radar from GNP to keep them in the know about what’s around them.
